At Tue, 11 Dec 2007 09:00:40 -0000,
"myepoch2008" <liu_xingjian@...> wrote:
>
> Do i must use quartz scheduling library for grabbing Web page in
> appointment time?

No, you can use any scheduling system that you can tie together with
Heritrix. cron, for instance, would work, if you started
jobs from the command line at a certain time.

> Can Heritrix oneself carry out it?

No, not out of the box.

best,
